content:
Play after an attack or effect causes you to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} or knocks you @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

You roll backward from the attack, landing on your feet. Take a Step away from the source of the attack (if any), and you're no longer prone or grabbed.
name: Roll Back
